title: Can post on NA boards but not on EU!
body:
Please help, on NA boards it lets me comment and post yet on EU boards it says I must be X lvl.... Im lvl 18 for quite a while tho. On EU boards it doesnt let me post/comment or anything, doesnt even show my boards profile there.

EDIT: Correction, on NA boards it lets me post only in a few sections (support, mechs, player behavior) But hey atleast something, on EU im stuck with nothing

replies.body: That's pretty freakin' weird! I fiddled with some buttons on our end that may have resolved your issue on the EUNE boards. Can you try making a test post in [**EUNE H&S**](http://boards.eune.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-en) to check if this fixed it for ya?  ^.^

Works perfectly now, ty my man

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

Ayyyy, no worries fam! HMU if you need help with anything else!

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
